Description of incident: A staff member found that a cable line hooked to the computers used by inmates had been connected to a line connecting to the entire Concord prison computer system.  This may have allowed one or more prisoners to view, steal, or change sensitive records. The network is used to track invoiced and billing for Correctional Industries contracts. Information from the offender management database system "Corrections Offender Records and Information System" may have been compromised as well.
